original_text: While Peter was still thinking about the vision, the Spirit said to him, “Simon, three men are looking for you.
korean_text: 베드로가 그 환상에 대하여 생각할 때에 성령께서 그에게 말씀하시되 두 사람이 너를 찾으니

sentences.original_text: While Peter was still thinking about the vision
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 아직 그 환상에 대해 생각하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: three men are looking for you
